title: [1.7.10][blockling——方块酱][SS/SM]更新V3.0.1一个友善的小跟班~[授权汉化][HAYO]
author: miguo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 猜猜谁是谁 于 2017-12-17 19:36 编辑 

矮人授权搬运&汉化&介绍
MOD本体矮人仅汉化lang文件中存在的文本~其余的择日再说。
HAYO studio出品

矮人的前言碎碎念

本来这是矮人复出之后早期几个搬运的MOD...矮人没打算把他继续搬运下去来的
但是坛友们的反应却出乎了矮人的意料，他们对于这MOD有着极大的热情...正如矮人所期望的，方块酱成为了MC世界的一个伙伴，而非仅仅是一个生物实体，但这方块酱还是有自己的缺陷，作者也在一点点修复。所以，只要诸君对此MOD继续保有热情，矮人就会一直更新下去

作者在3.0把说明完全重新制作了一次...还有作者怎么能看懂我胡七八敲出来的请求的...
下面开始

作者：如果您愿意通过小小捐赠来激励我，我将会不胜感激的。https://www.paypal.com/uk/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_flow&SESSION=sHkPpfboTu-OZ1drEZCLKdH（矮人注：作者官方账号，如果您有闲钱可以去支持一下。）


首先你需要找到自己的方块酱（方块酱现在会在平原和森林生物群落生成！），它们只能用鲜花右击来驯服，就这么简单。但是要注意，如果你驯服你的方块酱之后仍然有剩余的鲜花，别急着扔了它。因为如果你的方块酱在战斗中受伤了，你可以拿着鲜花对你的方块酱右击，这会让它好受些（治愈！）。你可以拿着鲜花Shift+右击来捡起你的方块酱。而且，在方块酱升级中，这些鲜花也是很有用的呦！

 如果你攻击了一个生物，你可爱的方块酱会跟着你一起打他！（恶魂和爬行者除外），每次攻击都会让你的方块酱获取经验值。每一次升级都会让方块酱的体积稍微变大，属性也会得到些许加强，当方块酱到达等级10的时候就是它体型的极限了，之后的升级只会让它变得更厉害！记住了！方块酱训练家们！如果你想去作个死，但不忍心让你的方块酱一起去送死，右击就可以让它原地不动了！
 这就是方块酱更有趣的地方了！等等？你说啥？你没发现？好吧！YOU A BIG OAF!!你需要空手然后对你的方块酱按下Shift+右击，会出现一个独特的方块酱GUI?!然后上面会出现很多很多的插槽，这些都可以用于你的方块酱升级!你可以从简单的做起，比如说给他一个木剑或者是五种原版剑的一种，再给他一个平常的升级插件。这些插件的制作公式很简单，就是中间一朵花，然后围上你所要做的材料。啥？你说这些东西太弱了？好吧，我猜你需要二级插件，或者是三级插件！这些插件制作起来还是和一级公式很像，不过就是鲜花换成上一等级的插件而已。（高级插件的安装需要低级插件）这些插件都需要安放在方块酱GUI?的正中槽位（事实上，每种插件都要放在那个绿色的槽位，然后电脑会自动给你安装。）。




 好吧，我猜你也许注意到升级槽下方的那几个小槽位了，这些都是特殊升级，分别为生命，伤害，速度，防御。如果你要升级他们，那么这会是个非常繁琐的活。但是这些都是值得的，每次升级，都会给方块酱带来意外的惊喜。
第一级升级插件需要一朵花，四个铁锭和两个药水。还有两个其他玩意。第二级则需要上一级的升级插件四个金锭，两个药水和之前两个玩意（2333），最后三级升级需要二级升级，四个钻石和两个药水和其他两个玩意。如果你听不懂我嘟囔的是啥，这有个生命升级插件的例子，也不是太难懂对么？



以下是四种插件的合成生命升级插件一级需要两个闪光西瓜和两瓶治疗2药水。二级需要两个闪光西瓜和两瓶治疗2药水。三级需要两个治疗2药水和两瓶再生1药水，装备了这个插件的方块酱将会自带再生效果！ 伤害升级插件一级需要两瓶瞬间伤害1药水和两个下界之星。二级需要两瓶瞬间伤害2药水和两个下界之星。三级需要两瓶瞬间伤害2药水和两个火焰粉末，装备了这个插件的方块酱将会自带火焰攻击效果！速度升级插件一级需要两瓶敏捷1药水和两个糖。二级需要两瓶敏捷2药水和两个糖。三级需要两瓶敏捷2药水和两个末影珍珠，装备了这个插件的方块酱将可以短时间内冲刺！防御升级插件一级需要两瓶力量1药水和两个黑曜石。二级需要两瓶力量2药水和两个黑曜石。三级需要两瓶力量2药水和两瓶抗火2药水，装备了这个插件的方块酱将不会受到火的伤害！


还有6个药水插件可以给你的方块酱升级，它们可以赋予你的方块酱相应的能力，它们的制作公式是一样的，四个铁锭，一个花和四个其他材料：虚弱升级插件（四瓶虚弱药水），毒性升级插件（四瓶中毒药水），跳跃升级插件（四根羽毛），抗性升级插件（四瓶力量药水），凋零升级插件（四个煤）（矮人：这个玩意…）迟缓升级插件（四瓶缓慢药水）。但你只可以给你方块酱安装六种中的两种。
 最后要出场的升级插件有些独特：返老还童，巨大化，隐形。不过咱们要先说好，返老还童升级插件会让你的方块酱变成一级那么大，而巨大化升级插件会让你的方块酱长到15级那么大！关于隐形升级插件，嗯，我想你大概知道这玩意是干啥的。他们和药水升级的制作公式完全相同，不过需要两个萤石，两个红石，其他材料和一朵花，返老还童升级插件需要四个发酵蜘蛛眼，巨大化升级插件需要四个糖，隐形升级插件需要四瓶隐形药水。
 最后，当你的方块酱阵亡之后，会在原地掉落一个方块酱（物品形态）。这个物品会储存你的方块酱等级，升级插件，防止你农兵三**一下回到解放前。当然，这不是无偿的，任何升级插件都只会保留一级的，二级或三级插件将会消失。当然，你拿鲜花右键收起来的方块酱不会有这个问题。还有就是要注意，复活你的方块酱需要耗费你自己的两颗半的心，所以说谨慎使用哦！
好啦~你是个合格的方块酱训练者了，快去训练几只吧！

最后不是关于MOD的介绍，而是一点作者的碎碎念（不是矮人的！去找原作者啦！），我想说这
是最初版本，可能有BUG，如果您在游戏过程中发现任何BUG请告诉我，我会第一时间修复，
如果方便也请告诉我您的意见和建议，好让我改进我的MOD，我很乐意见到任何人在他们的整合
里加入我的MOD，好了，就这么多，下面是MOD还有forge的下载地址了~

这个MOD只兼容1.7.10和1.72，所以请下载相应版本的Forge~安装只需要把我的MOD的
jar放入MODS文件夹即可~

【这是原文】

If you are wondering what in Lord Notch's name this mod could possibly be, it basically adds small, cube-shaped, tameable mobs that grow up to become the biggest, baddest blocks around. Now that may seem fairly straight forward but it can get slightly confusing when you get into it, so if you do need help with anything there is a guide down below which you should find pretty useful. If your query isn’t covered don’t hesitate to ask via a post at the bottom of the page as I will get back to you as quick as I can.    Downloads  The latest version if available for Minecraft 1.7.10. You must download and install the recommended version of Forge, depending on what version of Minecaft you are running. Once that is done, just open up the mods folder, found when you go to edit your Minecraft profile and click “Open Game Dir”, and drop the Blocklings.jar file into it. Alternatively you can use the installer made by 3dsboy08, just extract and run and you should be good to go.  Also, if you want to put this mod into a modpack then go ahead as that is awesome :)  Forge  Forge (all versions)   1.7.10  Blocklings v3.0.1  Blocklings v3.0.0 (Installer)  Blocklings v2.1.1   If you would like to support this mod by donating, it would be much appreciated, thank you  :)    Screenshots        Guide (Version 3)  The first thing you need to do is find a blockling, or spawn one in I suppose. They spawn in forests or plains biomes and are only able to be tamed with flowers by right clicking, both small and tall. However, once you have actually tamed your blockling don’t throw away your flowers because they can be used to heal your blockling if they get hurt, simply by right clicking again. They can also be used to pick up your blockling by shift right clicking and they are also used in a lot of recipes. If you now hit a mob (excluding creepers and ghasts) then your blockling will start to attack said mob. Upon attacking they will gain experience and eventually gain enough to level up. When they level up they will not only get a boost to their stats but also grow slightly up to level 10 when they won’t grow any larger. You can also level them up using the blockling level uperer from the creative tab just by right clicking on your blockling. If you are venturing somewhere very dangerous and don’t want to risk your blockling then just right click them to make them sit.  This is where it gets a bit more interesting. If you haven’t already figured it out, then shift right click on your blockling to upon their GUI. This displays their stats and their upgrade slots. To get upgrading then you will probably want to start by making some regular upgrades or just give them any of the 5 vanilla swords. These are made using a specific material depending on what level of upgrade you want. The recipes are all the same shape-wise, which is simply a flower surrounded by the respective material. But if that upgrade isn’t enough then you probably want to make a tier 2 version or even tier 3. To do this just craft another like before but instead of a flower in the middle put the previous tier. To apply these upgrades just put them in the green slot in the blockling’s GUI (or alternatively you can shift click which is much easier).      You might also have noticed the other set of upgrades adjacent to the regular upgrade slot at the bottom. These are more special upgrades, split into categories; health, damage, speed and defence. You must apply these in order again like the regular upgrades, but, each upgrade boost one specific stat with a bonus at tier 3. The recipes are quite complicated however. The first tier is always made up of a flower, 4 iron ingots, 2 potions and 2 other items. Then for tier 2 you need the previous upgrade, 4 gold ingots, 2 potions (but the next tier up) and the same 2 other items. Finally, for tier 3 you need the previous upgrade, 4 diamonds and the remaining ingredients. Here is an example with the health upgrades. There is a distinct pattern that isn’t too hard to pick up.     Health:  Tier 1 requires 2 potions of healing both tier 1 and 2 glistening melons. Tier 2 requires 2 potions of healing both tier 2 and 2 glistening melons again. Finally, tier 3 requires 2 potions of healing both tier 2 and 2 potions of regeneration both tier 1. The tier 3 upgrade will apply a regen effect to the blockling.  Damage:  Tier 1 requires 2 potions of harming both tier 1 and 2 nether quartz. Tier 2 requires 2 potions of harming both tier 2 and 2 nether quartz. Finally, tier 3 requires 2 potions of harming both tier 2 and 2 blaze powder. The tier 3 upgrade will arm your blockling with the ability to burn their enemies.  Speed:  Tier 1 requires 2 potions of swiftness both tier 1 and 2 sugar. Tier 2 requires 2 potions of swiftness both tier 2 and 2 sugar. Finally, tier 3 requires 2 potions of swiftness both tier 2 and 2 ender pearls. The tier 3 upgrade will allow your blockling to have periods of extreme speed.  Defence:  Tier 1 requires 2 potions of strength both tier 1 and 2 obsidian. Tier 2 requires 2 potions of strength both tier 2 and 2 obsidian. Finally, tier 3 requires 2 potions of strength both tier 2 and 2 potions of fire resistance. The tier 3 upgrade will prevent your blockling being damaged by fire.  There are also 6 potion like upgrades that give your blockling the ability of their respective potion effect. They are each crafted in the same way; 4 iron ingots, 4 other items and 1 flower. There are weakness (4 potions of weakness), jump boost (4 feathers), poison (4 potions of poison), resistance (4 potions of strength), wither (4 coal) and slowness (4 potions of slowness) upgrades, but only two can be applied at once.    Then the final set of upgrades are the unique ones. They consist of the shrink, grow and invisibility upgrades. I think you can probably guess what they do but just to clarify, the shrink upgrade shrinks your blockling to its level 1 size, the grow upgrade grows your blockling to the size of a level 15 blockling and the invisibility upgrade does what anyone would think it does. They are crafted in the exact same way as the potion upgrades but you need; 2 glowstone, 2 redstone, 4 other items and 1 flower. For shrink you need 4 fermented spider eyes, grow requires 4 sugar and invisibility requires 4 potions of invisibility.    One last ability of blocklings is that when they die in battle they will drop a small blockling item. This item, which will called whatever your blockling was named previously, can be right clicked on the ground, like a spawn egg, to spawn your blockling in again. This way you don’t have to worry as much about losing your level 10 blockling that you spent years trying to level up. However, it comes at a cost. Only the tier one upgrades will remain. So any tier 2 or tier 3 upgrades will be lost forever so be very very, very, very careful. This doesn’t apply to picking up your blockling so you can rest assured you won’t lose any upgrades. It also costs 2 and a half hearts to spawn back your blockling so be wary.

更新日志
V3.0.1:重新排版，更新汉化。删除旧版介绍
V2.03:补齐说明，汉化跟进。
V1.11:升级至1.710版本！
色彩字符！
V1.10:说不定现在能在服务器上玩了~
添加方块酱的小小背包！
添加方块酱的额外升级！
V1.05:添加治疗功能！
修复一个BUG，该BUG可能导致Lv7的方块酱不可被升级
V1.0.4:修复一个BUG，该BUG可能导致Lv10的方块酱不会显示材质。
添加一个配置文件，你可以在里面修改刷新率以及方块酱升级所需经验
添加由Miguo制作的汉化文件（就是我啦！2333）
V1.0.3：添加了一个小动画来区别方块酱的等待和跟随
大幅度改进AI！
防止野生方块酱也可以获得经验
产生率降低

replies.author: 鲜红的小希
replies.txt_content: 感觉方块酱可爱归可爱，却是个累赘……各种掉进河里淹死、掉进岩浆烧死，而且升级后体积变大，一格宽的方块它过不去，带他挖矿还必须考虑到它，挖两格宽的矿道……于是我把它练到5级后直接让它呆在家里不带出去了，就当是回家看到有人在等候我们的一种温暖吧……
